title: ICEYE’s four new Generation-3 satellites launch with SpaceX’s Transporter-8, introducing high-resolution Spot Fine image product
key_assets: ['four new Generation-3 SAR satellites', 'Spot Fine imaging mode', 'ICEYE US subsidiary']
summary: ICEYE successfully launched four new Generation-3 SAR satellites on SpaceX’s Transporter-8 mission, introducing a high-resolution Spot Fine image product. The satellites enhance ICEYE’s persistent monitoring capabilities with improved image quality and faster data downlink speeds.
why_it_matters: The launch expands ICEYE’s SAR constellation, enabling higher-resolution imagery and better monitoring capabilities for industries like insurance, natural catastrophe response, maritime, and national security. The new Spot Fine product improves detection of smaller features on the ground.
